name: Tap2Tilez
description:
Tap2Tilez is a simple Match 2 game.

  Gameplay :

Turn the tiles over and create the pair.

Complete the level in the shortest time possible

The remaining seconds give you an Extra Score Bonus.

  Developer :

I'm Skrokkio, 

this is my first Video Game published on Itch.io

Try it, Play and Comment!!
